name: Palmr
description: Palmr is a fast and secure platform for sharing files, built with performance and privacy in mind.
author: Kyantech

form_fields.label: Language
form_fields.hint: Default language for the application (optional, defaults to en-US)

form_fields.label: Reverse proxy (HTTPS)
form_fields.hint: Enable if behind reverse proxy with HTTPS (true or false)

form_fields.label: Presigned URL Expiration
form_fields.hint: Presigned URL expiration time in seconds (default: 3600)
